mapper.insert: insert into roomBoard (roomNum, boardNum, userId, boardTitle, boardContent, selectDay, adst, mode1, created) values (#{roomNum}, #{boardNum}, #{userId}, #{boardTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boardContent}, #{selectDay, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adst, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mode1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select roomNum, boardNum, userId, boardTitle, boardContent, selectDay, adst, selectDay, to_char(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, mode1 from roomBoard where roomNum = #{roomNum} order by created desc

select roomNum, boardNum, userId, boardTitle, boardContent, selectDay, adst, to_char(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, mode1 from roomBoard where roomNum = #{roomNum} and mode1 = #{mode1} order by created desc
select roomNum, boardNum, userId, boardTitle, boardContent, selectDay, adst, to_char(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created, mode1 from roomBoard where boardNum = #{boardNum}
select roomNum, subject, title, keyword, introduce, to_char(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created, totalP, currentP, manager, originalFileName, storedFileName from wholeRoom where roomNum = #{roomNum}
